scripts.__preinstall: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:scorm1.2 && cp -r dist ../assets/scorm1.2
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean && npm run asset:scorm1.2 && npm run asset:scorm2004 && npm run asset:web && npm run asset:indexeddb && npm run asset:pdf
scripts.asset:web: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:base && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/web
scripts.asset:pdf: cd LiaScript && git checkout feat/fullPage && npm i && npm run build:pdf && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/pdf && git checkout development
scripts.asset:scorm1.2: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:scorm1.2 && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/scorm1.2
scripts.asset:scorm2004: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:scorm2004 && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/scorm2004
scripts.asset:indexeddb: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:indexeddb && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/indexeddb
scripts.build: npx parcel build --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-scope-hoist src/index.ts && npm run shebang
